title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Plan A Field Trip
body: Plan A Field Trip       Quicklinks: Fee Waiver Instructions - submit your fee waiver ASAP! Reservation Form - request a ranger-led program (right click and select "save link as...") Resource Bin - check out a bin full of materials to use during your field trip Teacher's Guides: Self-Led Field Trip (small file - 3 MB) Self-Led Field Trip (large file - 38 MB)  Lead Your Own Field Trip   Theodore Roosevelt National Park is open year-round, and bringing your class to the park has never been easier! By leading your own field trip, you are able to cater to your specific education needs, as well as make your own schedule when visiting the park. Our curriculum materials and teacher's guide will help get you started.    Attend a Ranger-guided Program Teachers may also request a ranger-led field trip. The park receives the bulk of our requests for the month of May. Staffing limitations prevent us from offering a program to everyone interested, so submit your request early. Please check our requirements for attending a ranger program.
